title: Is it worth it to major in philosophy? What career options are there? - Quora

(that’s a nice bonus huh!”

I think it is worth it. Only 2 majors advantage student in postgraduate admission exams: maths and philosophy. Employers in the US have a preference for Philosophy majors, since philosophy students learn better than most how to ask questions and think through desirable solutions to problems. The only specific career options for philosophy majors are academic or advisor jobs.
